messages.title: The most expensive Oldham election ever?
messages.content: Political rivals are accusing the Lib Dems of trying to buy the Oldham election with money from the London and Bermuda bank, Jardent. What's at stake is more than who runs the town. It's time for Phil Woolas to stand up against this influential outside money and put Oldham first.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Tony Blair, Liam Forristal, Mohammad Tufail, Neil Kinnock

leaflet.personalStatement: Phil Woolas believes in fairness and the quality of service you get from someone who cares about his constituents.

politicalExperience.achievements: Phil Woolas has stood up for fairness and quality of service.

endorsements.endorsement: Phil Woolas stands up for his constituents.
He has a strong moral value system.

endorsements.endorser: Liam Forristal, Founder of Revolution FM
endorsements.endorsement: Woolas is the man when service is your vote.

endorsements.endorser: Mohammad Tufail, President of Pitt Street Mosque
endorsements.endorsement: Wouldn't it be good to have an advocate for your faith in government?
I'm impressed by Phil's hard work and dedication to serving our community over many years.
